LanguageData.JRWDromaeosaurus.label: Dromaeosaurus
LanguageData.JRWDromaeosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #045644-1922 [DROMAEOSAURUS ALBERTENSIS] CODENAME: RUNNER >482
A quick moving dromaeosaur with razor sharp teeth and long, sickle like claws ready for shredding. Their mottled hides allow them to run through tall grasses and blend well into the shadows of the foliage before the pack moves in for the kill. Despite having a rugged build compared to other dromaeosaurs, these dinosaurs were specialised creatures compared to their relatives.

LanguageData.JRWDromaeosaurus.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.JRWDromaeosaurus.tools.teeth.label: teeth
